plot: In this special edition of 20/20, Barbara Walters presents the results of a poll conducted by ABC News and People magazine to determine what America thinks are the best TV shows of all time.
title: Best in TV: The Greatest TV Shows of Our Time
plot_es: In this special edition of 20/20, Barbara Walters presents the results of a poll conducted by ABC News and People magazine to determine what America thinks are the best TV shows of all time.
original_name: Best in TV: The Greatest TV Shows of Our Time
plot_en: In this special edition of 20/20, Barbara Walters presents the results of a poll conducted by ABC News and People magazine to determine what America thinks are the best TV shows of all time.
